STOP THE BAN ON BURQA (VEIL) IN SCHOOL AND PUBLIC PLACE!

as we know that many party members are trying to ban the veil in schools and public places!
why should the veil be banned? is it causing anybody harm? is it disrupting lessons in school? or is it just because it doesn't look good in Britain?
I believe that the veil makes Britain look more of a freedom country that it says it is!

STOP THE BANNING OF BURQA (VEIL)
